Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» Drug dealer and Prizefighter Chance is released after five years in prison, determined to come to terms with his past and his life-time offender's father, who had just been recruited to the leader of the Aryan Brotherhood. But when he is forced to help an old friend with a large debt to a local gangster, Chance drawn instead into the world of violence, drugs and corruption, where his father works. While he finds the love of a black woman and may also learn that he has a son to care for. And when the two worlds are woven together in a deadly drama, Chance must choose who he really is ...
